573:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-avinivartanīyasya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ke ākārāḥ,
573:4: kathaṃ vā bhagavan vayaṃ jānīyāma ayamavinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti?
573:10: sarvāścaitāstathatāyā advayā advaidhīkārā avikalpā nirvikalpā iti tāṃ tathatāṃ tāṃ dharmatāmavataranti|
573:11: tathatāyāṃ sthitastathatāṃ na kalpayati na vikalpayati,
573:13: evamavatīrṇo yathātathatāṃ śrutvāpi tato'pi cāpakramya na kāṅkṣati na vimatiṃ karoti,
573:20: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ||
573:21: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nānyeṣāṃ śramaṇānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ vā mukhamullokayati-ime bhagavantaḥ śramaṇā brāhmaṇā vā jñeyaṃ jānanti,
573:24: na cānyebhyo devebhyaḥ puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā mālyaṃ vā vilepanaṃ vā cūrṇaṃ vā vastraṃ vā chatraṃ vā dhvajaṃ vā ghaṇṭāṃ vā patākāṃ vā dīpaṃ vā dātavyaṃ manyate,
573:26: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ|
573:27: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāpāyeṣūpapadyate,
573:29: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate|
573:52: evaṃ khalu subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svayaṃ ca daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate,
573:53: parānapi ca daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati pratiṣṭhāpayati dṛḍhīkaroti|
573:54: sa svapnāntaragato'pi daśakuśalān karmapathānekaikato vā bāhulyato vā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ nādhyāpadyate,
573:56: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya svapnāntaragatasyāpi daśakuśalāḥ karmapathā āmukhībhavanti|
573:57: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ||
573:58: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaṃ yaṃ dharmaṃ paryavāpnoti,
573:61: dadāti ca-imamahaṃ dharmaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya paryavāpnomi dadāmi ca,
573:64: anayā dharmadeśanayā dhārmikā abhiprāyāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ paripūryantāmiti|
573:66: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ||
573:67: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu na kāṅkṣati,
573:75: so'bhikrāman vā pratikrāman vā na bhrāntacitto'bhikrāmati vā,
573:84: na ca sahasā pādaṃ bhūmau nikṣipati,
573:86: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śarīre cīvaraparibhogo na yūkilo bhavati|
573:90: yāni khalu punaranyeṣāṃ sattvānāmaśītiḥ kṛmikulasahasrāṇi kāye saṃbhavanti,
573:91: tāni tasya kāye sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na saṃbhavanti|
573:93: tathā hi tasya tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvalokābhyudgatāni bhavanti||
573:94: yathā yathā ca tasya tāni kuśalamūlāni vivardhante,
573:95: tathā tathā sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāyapariśuddhiṃ ca parigṛhṇīte,
573:99: bhagavānāha-yathā yathā subhūte tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tāni kuśalamūlāni vivardhante,
573:100: tathā tathā sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścittālpakṛtyatāṃ ca parigṛhṇīte,
573:101: cittāśāṭhyatāṃ ca cittāmāyāvitāṃ ca cittākuṭilatāṃ cittāvaṅkatāṃ ca parigṛhṇīte,
573:102: yayā ca subhūte cittapariśuddhyā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmimatikrānto bhavati|
573:103: iyaṃ subhūte tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittapariśuddhirveditavyā|
573:104: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ||
573:105: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na lābhasatkāraślokaguruko bhavati,
573:108: na ca gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu saṃsīdati|
573:112: yaṃ ca satkṛtya parato dharmaṃ śṛṇoti,
573:119: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ avinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ||
573:120: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānaṣṭau mahānirayānabhinirmāya tatra ekaikasmin mahāniraye bahūni bodhisattvaśatāni bahūni bodhisattvasahasrāṇi bahūni bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇyabhinirmāya avinivartanīyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamevaṃ vadet-ye tathāgatena avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākṛtāḥ,
573:129: sacedevamapi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ na kṣubhyati,
573:133: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ||
573:134: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇa avinivartanīyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati-yadetattvayā pūrvaṃ śrutaṃ tatpratideśaya,
573:149: sacetpunaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kṣubhyati na calati,
573:150: śrutvāpi cemāṃ vācaṃ mārasya pāpīyasaḥ dharmatāmeva pratisarati,
573:153: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte arhan bhikṣuḥ kṣīṇāsravo na parasya śraddhayā gacchati dharmatāyāṃ pratyakṣakārī|
573:155: evameva subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'navamardanīyaḥ śrāvakayānikaiḥ pudgalaiḥ pratyekabuddhayānikaiśca|
573:157: śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā niyato bhavati sarvajñatāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiparāyaṇaḥ|
573:158: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā avinivartanīyadhātau sthito bhavati,
573:160: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ||
573:161: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramya kaścidevaṃ vakṣyatisaṃsāracārikaiṣā,
573:166: kutaḥ punastvamanyamātmabhāvaṃ parigrahītavyaṃ manyase iti vā|
573:168: tamenaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān svayamevaṃ vakṣyati-icchasi tvaṃ draṣṭuṃ tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān yairgaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyupasthitāścīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ,
573:170: gaṅgānadīvālukopamā eva buddhā bhagavantaḥ paryupāsitāḥ paripṛṣṭāḥ paripraśnīkṛtāśca asyaiva bodhisattvayānasyārthāya kathaṃ bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sthātavyamiti?
573:173: tathāpi sthitvā tathā caritvā tathaiva yogamāpadya adyāpi taireva tāvanna anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā|
573:174: tathā avavādānuśāsanyāṃ sthitaistathā śikṣamāṇaiḥ sarvajñatā nānuprāptā|
573:177: taṃ māraḥ pāpīyāṃstasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe bhikṣūnabhinirmāyaivaṃ vakṣyati-ete bhikṣavo'rhantaḥ kṣīṇāsravāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
573:181: sacetkhalu punarevamapi bhāṣyamāṇe evaṃ nirdiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ na kṣubhyati na calati,
573:183: sacedbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ parataḥ śrutvaivaṃ vivekapadāni dharmatāyā na parihīyate,
573:186: tāni ca sarvāṇi mārakarmāṇi tathā saṃjānāti-asthānaṃ subhūte anavakāśaḥ,
573:187: yatsa bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā caran pāramitāsu na sarvajñatāmanuprāpnuyāt-asthānametadanavakāśo yattathā caratastathā śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yathā tathāgatairākhyātaṃ tayā caryayā avirahitasya ebhiḥ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairviharato māraḥ pāpīyānnāvatāraṃ lapsyate|
573:193: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ||
573:194: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpasaṃjñāmabhisaṃskāroti,
573:196: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāṃ na saṃjñāsaṃjñāṃ na saṃskārasaṃjñām|
573:202: tata ucyate anutpādajñānakṣāntiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīya iti|
573:203: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ||
573:204: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamevaṃ vicchandayiṣyati-ākāśasamaiṣā yaduta sarvajñatā|
573:217: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ jñātavyamevaṃ samanvāhartavyamevaṃ veditavyam-mārakarmaivaitat,
573:221: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ||
573:222: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūminirvṛttaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ pravṛtto bhavati|
573:224: tathā dvitīyaṃ tathā tṛtīyaṃ tathā caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate|
573:230: idamapi subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam||
573:231: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nāmaguruko bhavati,
573:241: nāsya bhavatyadhimātraḥ kāmeṣu kāmābhiṣvaṅgo vā abhiprāyo vā|
573:244: tadyathāpi subhūte caurakāntāramadhyagataḥ puruṣaḥ āhārakṛtyaṃ kurvannutrastasaṃjñyevāhāraṃ kuryāt,
573:246: kadā nu khalu nāma ahamitaścaurakāntārādatikrānto bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃsaṃjñī aviśrabdhamāhāramāharati|
573:247: evameva subhūte avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā agāramadhyāvasanto yān yāneva kāmān paribhuñjate,
573:248: tāṃstānanarthikā eva agṛddhā eva asaktā eva kāmān paribhuñjate|
573:249: anarthikā eva ca te bhavanti priyarūpasātarūpaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ|
573:254: tathā hi taiḥ satpuruṣairmahāpuruṣairatipuruṣaiḥ puruṣapravaraiḥ puruṣaśobhanaiḥ puruṣarṣabhaiḥ puruṣodāraiḥ puruṣaśauṭīraiḥ puruṣapuṃgavaiḥ puruṣadhuryaiḥ puruṣapadmaiḥ puruṣapuṇḍarīkaiḥ puruṣājāneyaiḥ puruṣanāgaiḥ puruṣasiṃhaiḥ puruṣadamyasārathibhiḥ sarvasattvāḥ paramasukhe niyojayitavyāḥ|
573:255: evaṃ hi subhūte agāramadhyāvasanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitābalādhānaprāptatvāt|
573:256: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyāḥ||
573:257: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vajrapāṇirmahāyakṣo nityānubaddho bhavati|
573:266: tāni sarvāṇi sarveṇa sarvaṃ na prayojayati|
573:272: sa na striyaṃ na ca puruṣaṃ vyākaroti-putro vā te bhaviṣyati,
573:275: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ||
573:276: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ye ākārā yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāni yairākārairyairliṅgairyairnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo veditavyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
573:308: te tathāgatadarśanamevākāṅkṣanta ākāṅkṣanti anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
573:311: evaṃ te avirahitā bhavanti tathāgatadarśanena tathāgataparyupāsanena tathāgataparyupasthānena ca||
573:312: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kāmāvacarebhyo devebhyaścyutā rūpāvacarebhya ārūpyāvacarebhyo vā devebhyaścyutāḥ santaḥ ihaiva madhyadeśe jambūdvīpe pratyājāyante|
573:325: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ||
573:326: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati-avinivartanīyo vāham,
573:331: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte srotaāpannaḥ srotaāpattiphale svakāyāṃ bhūmau na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati|
573:336: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣa ānantaryakārī ānantaryacittena avirahito bhavati,
573:338: na taccittaṃ śaknoti prativinodayituṃ vā viṣkambhayituṃ vā|
573:340: evameva subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyacittaṃ sthitaṃ bhavati,
573:342: sadevamānuṣāsureṇāpi lokena na śakyaṃ cālayituṃ vā kampayituṃ vā|
573:345: tasya svasyāṃ bhūmau niṣkāṅkṣasya nirvicikitsasya jātivyativṛttasyāpi na śrāvakacittaṃ na pratyekabuddhacittaṃ votpadyate|
573:347: abhisaṃbhotsye evāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ svasyāṃ bhūmau sthitaḥ|
573:351: tathā hi sa sthito'saṃhāryeṇa cittena asaṃhāryeṇa jñānena samanvāgato bhavati|
573:355: na tava te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni vā saṃvidyante,
573:359: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo vyākṛtaḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti|
573:365: evaṃ samanvāharati-māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān buddhādhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā māṃ vivecayitukāmo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhita iti|
573:367: veditavyametatsubhūte vyākṛto'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ|
573:369: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ime ākārā imāni liṅgāni imāni nimittāni saṃvidyante,
573:371: addhā batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛtaḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ|
573:374: tathā hyasya te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni saṃvidyante,
573:376: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ||
573:377: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtaśaḥ ātmaparityāgamapi karoti,
573:379: tasmādbodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyaḥ saddharmaparigrahāya paramudyogamāpadyate atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ premṇā ca gauraveṇa ca|
573:380: dharmakāyā buddhā bhagavanta iti dharme prema ca gauravaṃ copādāya saddharmaparigrahaṃ karoti|
573:383: anāgatānāmapi buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmeṣa eva saddharmaparigrahaḥ-ahamapi tatra teṣāmanāgatānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saṃkhyāṃ gaṇanāṃ praviṣṭa iti,
573:386: sa imamapyarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtaśa ātmaparityāgamapi karoti,
573:390: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ||
573:391: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati,
573:393: subhūtirāha-kiṃ tathāgatasyaiva bhagavan dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati,
573:395: bhagavānāha-śrāvakasyāpi subhūte dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati|
573:397: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā|
573:401: ebhiḥ subhūte guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo bhavati|
573:402: imānyapi subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ākāraliṅganimittāni veditavyānyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti||
